metadata.title: CVE-2024-24795 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: HTTP Response splitting in multiple modules in Apache HTTP Server allows anattacker that can inject malicious response headers into backendapplications to cause an HTTP desynchronization attack.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.4.59, which fixes this issue.

criterions.comment: apache2 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
